languages.text: "Я... Думала, вам нужен {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатор{/g}. Если нет," {n}— лицо Кассии мигом черствеет, —{/n} "я с превеликим удовольствием покину вас вместе с почтенным регентом".

traits.locale_text: "Я... Думала, вам нужен {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатор{/g}. Если нет," {n}- лицо Кассии мигом черствеет, -{/n} "я с превеликим удовольствием покину вас вместе с почтенным регентом".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I... I thought you needed a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. If you do not," {n}Cassia says, her face hardening in an instant,{/n} "it will be my pleasure to leave with the esteemed regent."
languages.original_text: "Я... Думала, вам нужен {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатор{/g}. Если нет," {n}— лицо Кассии мигом черствеет, —{/n} "я с превеликим удовольствием покину вас вместе с почтенным регентом".

traits.locale_text: "I... I thought you needed a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigator{/g}. if you do not," {n}- Cassia's face goes stern in a flash, -{/n} "it will be my pleasure to leave with the esteemed regent."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... I thought you needed a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigator{/g}. if you do not," {n}- Cassia's face goes stern in a flash, -{/n} "it will be my pleasure to leave with the esteemed regent."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... I thought you needed a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. If you do not," {n}Cassia says, her face hardening in an instant,{/n} "it will be my pleasure to leave with the esteemed regent."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... I thought you needed a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. If you do not," {n}Cassia says, her face hardening in an instant,{/n} "it will be my pleasure to leave with the esteemed regent."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我……我还以为你需要一位{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}，但如果你不需要……”{n}卡西娅开了口，她的表情瞬间变得冷硬起来。{/n}“我会很乐意与尊敬的摄政王一同离开。”
languages.original_text: "I... I thought you needed a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. If you do not," {n}Cassia says, her face hardening in an instant,{/n} "it will be my pleasure to leave with the esteemed regent."

traits.locale_text: “我……我还以为你需要一位{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}，但如果你不需要……”{n}卡西娅开了口，她的表情瞬间变得冷硬起来。{/n}“我会很乐意与尊敬的摄政王一同离开。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Pen... pensaba que necesitaba una {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g}. Si no es así», {n}dice Cassia, endureciendo su gesto al momento,{/n} «será un placer marcharme con el estimado regente».
languages.original_text: "I... I thought you needed a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. If you do not," {n}Cassia says, her face hardening in an instant,{/n} "it will be my pleasure to leave with the esteemed regent."

traits.locale_text: «Pen... pensaba que necesitaba una {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g}. Si no es así», {n}dice Cassia, endureciendo su gesto al momento,{/n} «será un placer marcharme con el estimado regente».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたは…{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}が必要だったのではないのですか」{n}カシアは表情をこわばらせながら言葉を紡ぐ{/n}「尊敬する摂政と共にお別れできることを嬉しく思います」
languages.original_text: "I... I thought you needed a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. If you do not," {n}Cassia says, her face hardening in an instant,{/n} "it will be my pleasure to leave with the esteemed regent."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは…{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}が必要だったのではないのですか」{n}カシアは表情をこわばらせながら言葉を紡ぐ{/n}「尊敬する摂政と共にお別れできることを嬉しく思います」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ... ich dachte, Ihr braucht einen {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. Falls nicht", {n}sagt Cassia, und ihr Ausdruck verhärtet sich sofort,{/n} "wird es mir ein Vergnügen sein, Euch zusammen mit dem geschätzten Regenten zu verlassen."
languages.original_text: "I... I thought you needed a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. If you do not," {n}Cassia says, her face hardening in an instant,{/n} "it will be my pleasure to leave with the esteemed regent."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... ich dachte, Ihr braucht einen {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. Falls nicht", {n}sagt Cassia, und ihr Ausdruck verhärtet sich sofort,{/n} "wird es mir ein Vergnügen sein, Euch zusammen mit dem geschätzten Regenten zu verlassen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je... Je croyais que vous aviez besoin d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g}. Si ce n'est pas le cas, je repartirai avec plaisir avec le régent, » {n}conclut-elle, le visage fermé.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... I thought you needed a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. If you do not," {n}Cassia says, her face hardening in an instant,{/n} "it will be my pleasure to leave with the esteemed regent."

traits.locale_text: « Je... Je croyais que vous aviez besoin d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g}. Si ce n'est pas le cas, je repartirai avec plaisir avec le régent, » {n}conclut-elle, le visage fermé.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ben... Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı'ya{/g} ihtiyacın olduğunu düşünmüştüm. Eğer yoksa..." {n}Cassia konuşurken yüz ifadesi aniden katılaşıyor.{/n} "Değerli naip ile birlikte ayrılmak benim için bir zevk olur."
languages.original_text: "I... I thought you needed a {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}. If you do not," {n}Cassia says, her face hardening in an instant,{/n} "it will be my pleasure to leave with the esteemed regent."

traits.locale_text: "Ben... Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g}'ya ihtiyacın olduğunu düşünmüştüm. Eğer yoksa..." {n}Cassia konuşurken yüz ifadesi aniden katılaşıyor.{/n} "Değerli naip ile birlikte ayrılmak benim için bir zevk olur."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
